source_caption_data.pre_caption: This video presents an extreme wide shot of a coastal landscape with no single main subject. Initially, a dense green forest occupies the foreground and middle ground, filling the majority of the frame from the bottom upwards, with a large tree prominent in the right foreground. The ocean and a portion of the coastline are visible in the background, positioned across the top of the frame under a blue sky. The camera, positioned at a high aerial angle, slowly ascends. This movement causes the foreground trees to shift downwards, revealing more of the middle-ground forest and the full expanse of the curved coastline in the background. As the shot progresses, the ocean and sky take up slightly more space at the top of the frame, while the vast jungle stretches out below.
